attributes.action: Reverse the plan to remove Britannia from fifty pence coins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The figure of Britannia has graced British coinage since 1672, as is deserving of her role as the symbol of our country. Yet she is to be replaced on the fifty pence piece by a 'representation of Modern Britain' at the expense of the personification of Britain's rich and immensely important history.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
